aws_sagemaker_notebook_instance.description: Provides a Sagemaker Notebook Instance resource.

name.description: The name of the notebook instance (must be unique).

role_arn.description: The ARN of the IAM role to be used by the notebook instance which allows SageMaker to call other services on your behalf.

instance_type.description: The name of ML compute instance type.

kms_key_id.description: The AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS

lifecycle_config_name.description: The name of a lifecycle configuration to associate with the notebook instance.

direct_internet_access.description: Set to `Disabled` to disable internet access to notebook. Requires `security_groups` and `subnet_id` to be set. Supported values: `Enabled` (Default

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource.

id.description: The name of the notebook instance.

arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) assigned by AWS to this notebook instance.
